sameAnalysis.part_name: 这3个动词均有"消灭"之意。
means: destroy ： 指通过杀戮或终止某人某物的机能，使之无用或毁灭。
exterminate ： 指大量地、成批地杀害、消灭。
extinguish ： 原义指灭火，转义后暗示生命、希望等像火一样地消灭、熄灭。

sentence.Network_en: A huge effort was made to exterminate the rats.
Some people exterminate garden insects by spraying poison on the plants.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些人在植物上喷撒毒剂以杀死花园内的昆虫.

sentence.Network_en: It is necessary to exterminate the post at the sawmill.
sentence.Network_cn: 必须端掉锯木厂边的哨所.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 殄字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 同本义〖 useup;exhaust〗 消灭〖 exterminate〗 通“腆”。美好;善〖 good〗.
灭字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 灭火器〖 fireextinguisher〗 灭绝〖 exterminate;ruin〗 消灭;摧毁〖 extirpate〗.
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... exterior 外部的；外来的，外表 exterminate 灭绝，根除 external 外面的，外部的.
恐怖片《26种死法》-电影吧 | 微吧一起扎堆吧！ ... Dogfight（ 斗狗） Exterminate（ 斩尽杀绝） Fart（ 屁熏而亡）.

灭绝营（extermination camps）（Extermination camps）是第二次世界大战期间，纳粹德国其中一项建设来有组织地集体屠杀人的地方，也是就所谓的犹太人 …
移除 English, 翻译, 发音,... ... 远程设备擦除 remote device wipe 诛除 to exterminate;to wipe out 准删除记录 ghost record.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'drive out, banish'): from Latin exterminat- 'driven out, banished', from the verb exterminare, from ex- 'out' + terminus 'boundary'. The sense 'destroy' (mid 16th cent.) comes from the Latin of the Vulgate

entry.def: To exterminate a group of people or animals means to kill all of them.

example.ex: A huge effort was made to exterminate the rats...
They have a real fear that they'll be exterminated in the ongoing civil war...
example.tran: 他们十分害怕自己会在持续的内战中被彻底消灭。

means.word_mean: 1. kill en masse; kill on a large scale; kill many;

sentences.sentence: "Hitler wanted to exterminate the Jews, Gypsies, Communists, and homosexuals of Europe"

means.word_mean: 2. destroy completely, as if down to the roots;

sentences.sentence: "the vestiges of political democracy were soon uprooted"

auth_sentence.content: Hitler firmly believed that his god wanted him to exterminate Jews.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hitler firmly believed that his god wanted him to exterminate Jews.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hitler firmly believed that his god wanted him to exterminate Jews.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: And it was squirrels that Mr. Rinella was proposing we exterminate and then eat.

stems_affixes.word_buile: determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ate……的→adj.确定的
determine[v.决心,决定;确定,限定]+ed……的→adj.下定了决心的
in无+termin界限;末端+able可以……的→没有界限的→无穷无尽的
determinate[adj.确定的]+ive表名词→n.决定之事, 限定词
termin界限;末端+al表名词→n.终点[站];终端
terminate[v.[使]结束,[使]停止]+ion表名词→n.终止,结束
termin界限;末端+ology学科→定出界限的学科→下定义→术语学
termin界限;末端+us→界限之点→终点
de加强+termin界限;末端+e→加强界限→确定
ex出+termin界限;末端+ate表动词→从界限中赶出来→根除
termin界限;末端+ate表动词→定出界限→终结

sentences.en: Some people exterminate garden insects by spraying poison on the plants.
sentences.cn: 有些人在植物上喷撒毒剂以杀死花园内的昆虫。
